Text:
There is no swesub or any other international sub except for norsub.

The film is already out on DVD in Norway, but since it's coming out internationally worldwide in 2013, I'm guessing the directors didn't take the chance of other people from other countries getting to see the film before hand with subs. 
Kind of silly really, but that's just how it is.

A Jacques Cousteau above the waterline - Thor Heyerdahl

Ra-Ra, row the boat, and no happy Easter

Norsk - Absolutt ingen problemer (just me and booze).
